message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $13,000 to start. What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $7,000 is significantly below its true value.  How about we meet in the middle at $10,000? This is my final offer.
I appreciate your persistence, but $10,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $9,000. Can we discuss further?
